snippet.title: Volcanoids -  Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Volcanoids on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/951440/Volcanoids/

Volcanoids is a first-person, base building survival game set in the steampunk era where humans and technology meet. Explore a volcanic island, operating giant drills and enduring eruptions triggered by a mechanical race of beings.

This video doesn't represent the final look of the game, everything you see is a work in progress.

Join the community on Discord: https://discord.gg/volcanoids
Check out the development roadmap: https://trello.com/b/xsj3vAs1/volcanoids-feature-roadmap
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/volcanoids
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Volcanoids/

Credits:
Trailer music was created by Arthur Cordeiro
https://soundcloud.com/agcor
